public abstract class RuleAbstract
extends java.lang.Object
implements Rule

Author:
Gautham Nagaraju, Prakhar Dubey, Akash Kulkarni, Victor Dong The class is an abstract class that implements the Rule interface. It has abstract methods that defines how the next state of a cell.
